verbs.description: it time for [ARG0: the bulls] to [V: spin] [ARG1: the point guard roulette wheel] [ARGM-TMP: after playing just one regular season game] kris dunn has been sidelined with a sprained left mcl and is expected to miss 4 - 6 weeks of action so what does fred hoiberg do now point guard kris dunn chicago bulls ryan arcidiacono bulls fred hoiberg guard nba tyler ulis zach lavine dallas cameron payne lauri markkanen shaq harrison kemba walker the point
